hero.title: Welcome to Toit: Bangalore's Original Craft Beer Experience
hero.subtitle: Discover award-winning brews, delectable dishes, and an unforgettable atmosphere right here at Toit. Your perfect pour awaits.

about.title: The Toit Story: Crafting Bangalore's Brew Culture
about.paragraph1: The first Toit to open its doors and one of the city’s first microbreweries. We wanted to give people a place to be themselves – while enjoying some great brews, food, and ambience.
about.paragraph2: More than just a pub, Toit is a vibrant community hub where friends gather, stories are shared, and every sip is a celebration. From our meticulously crafted lagers and IPAs to our diverse culinary menu, we're dedicated to delivering a premium experience that keeps you coming back for more.
